text:
I try to use jmeter nightly (2001-11-03) with ssl. Trying to get to a https site
generates a exception :java.lang.ClassNotFoundException:
org.apache.jmeter.util.JsseSSLManager.
I have installed sun jsse102.
Some debug info. I can provide more if applicable.

text:
Unable to reproduce - Confirmed with submitter that newer versions have
corrected this issue.
creator: jim@boutcher.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
